# PED::SET_AI_WEAPON_DAMAGE_MODIFIER

## Summary
Applies a damage modifier when ai is inflicting weapon damage

## Parameters
* **FLOAT** modifier

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
This function will change the ai weapon damage multiplier
